revised_title: Properties and Reactions of Silicic Acid and Colloidal Substances
tldr: The author, Thomas Graham, explores the properties and reactions of silicic acid and other colloidal substances. He discusses the solubility, liquidity, and pectization of silicic acid, as well as its interactions with various liquids and the formation of substitution-products. Graham also examines the formation of alcogel and alcosol, compounds of alcohol and silicic acid, and their reactions with other substances.
